headline: Wedbush downgrades Lyft on autonomous vehicle disruption risk
summary: Investing.com -- Wedbush downgraded Lyft to Underperform from Neutral in a note on Friday, warning that 2026 could mark a turning point for the ridesharing industry as autonomous vehicles gain traction.

raw.headline: Wedbush downgrades Lyft on autonomous vehicle disruption risk
raw.summary: Investing.com -- Wedbush downgraded Lyft to Underperform from Neutral in a note on Friday, warning that 2026 could mark a turning point for the ridesharing industry as autonomous vehicles gain traction.

headline: 2 Internet Stocks with Solid Fundamentals and 1 We Brush Off
summary: Consumer internet businesses are redefining how people engage with the world by giving them instant connectivity and convenience. This influence cuts both ways though because they have high exposure to the ups and downs of consumer spending, and uncertainty surrounding this factor has capped the industry’s returns - over the past six months, its 6.9% gain has lagged the S&P 500 by 6.1 percentage points.
